entry.Gold: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
entry.Silver: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
entry.Crystal: Because different types of UNOWN exist, it is said that they must have a variety of abilities.
entry.RubySapphire: This POKéMON is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various UNOWN. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.
entry.FireRed: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.
entry.LeafGreen: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.
entry.Emerald: This POKéMON is shaped like ancient text characters. Although research is ongoing, it is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various UNOWN.
entry.Diamond: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.
entry.Pearl: They seem to communicate among each other telepathically. They are always found stuck on walls.
entry.Platinum: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
